Posts.Content: Sorry to tell you but yes my breast cancer did not show up on the mammogram or ultra sound test I had a surgical biospy and it came back as Inflammtory breast cancer, my doctor just thought I had a pulled  musle in my breast and put me on anitibiotics for 3 weeks and there was still no improvement...
Posts.Title: Did anyone's cancer NOT show up on Mammogram or Ultrasound?

Posts.Content: Amen sister!  i also have IBC and it does not show up in mammograms or ultra sound test.. my  IBC just showed up overnight. So it pays to know and listen to your body... Diana
Posts.Title: Did anyone's cancer NOT show up on Mammogram or Ultrasound?
